param.name: segment
param.label: Segment
param.help: Segmentation calls (.cns), the output of the 'segment' command.

param.name: chromosome
param.label: Chromosome range
param.help: Chromosome or chromosomal range, e.g. 'chr1' or 'chr1:2333000-2444000'

param.name: gene
param.label: Name of gene or genes (comma-separated) to display

param.name: range_list
param.label: Range list
param.help: File listing the chromosomal ranges to display, as BED

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.help: Width of margin to show around the selected gene(s) or small chromosomal region

param.name: antitarget_marker
param.label: Antitarget marker
param.help: Plot antitargets using this symbol when plotting in a selected chromosomal region

param.name: by_bin
param.label: Plot data x-coordinates by bin indices instead of genomic coordinates

param.name: trend
param.label: Draw a smoothed local trendline on the scatter plot.

param.name: vcf
param.label: VCF file
param.help: VCF file name containing variants for calculation of b-allele frequencies.

param.name: sample_id
param.label: Name of the sample in the VCF to use for b-allele frequency extraction.

param.name: normal_id
param.label: Corresponding normal sample ID in the input VCF
param.help: This sample is used to select only germline SNVs to calculate b-allele frequencies.

param.name: min_variant_depth
param.label: Minimum read depth for a SNV to be used in the b-allele frequency calculation.

param.name: zygosity_freq
param.label: Zygosity frequencies
param.help: Ignore VCF's genotypes (GT field) and instead infer zygosity from allele frequencies.
